name: Outer Power
description:
This is very bare bones, like a skeleton to a body. This was mainly a learning project for us. You can pick a character of your choice then are thrown into the fire! You are allowed to pick up a weapon of your choice and destroy the enemies that are coming at you. Each enemy will give you score and money, at the end of the wave/day you are allowed to upgrade your stats. See how high of a score you can get!

------

First game that I have ever made.

Special thanks to Ramon for teaching me a whole lot. 

This project was to just learn and get a grasp of the engine jumping straight in. With the many ideas we have with this game we would love to continue but it is best to take this as a learning experience and create new games. 

------

*Credits*

Ryan Borbone : Lead Designer, Lead Artist, Lead Sound & Music, Programmer

Ramon Meza:  Lead Programmer, Designer

Eddie Chace: Voice Actor
